data.text:
@HHSGov No responsible parent would give their child a drug for something that is only 11% effective with unknown longterm side effects.

There are ZERO studies that can tell you the side effects of the vax 5-10 year plus down the road.

NONE

Please don’t gamble with your kids life.
@HHSGov Simply following orders is not an excuse or an out from a Nuremberg type trial. https://t.co/2eaeBry9Wc
@HHSGov Good luck with that lawsuit on the Government. https://t.co/uWqTC7wozA

@HHSGov If you don’t mind taking the chance of having your heart exploding. Approving  vaccines for children was evil! AND denying the fact that therapeutics are so effective - is a crime against humanity! AND remdisiver is a horrible drug and you know it! Someone needs to go to prison!
@HHSGov The bandage is the new mask

@SussieSuzy @HHSGov oh calm down! You and your children can still wear your mask, no one is forcing you to not wear one like we were forced to wear one and get injected to keep our jobs, or just to move freely. Now you  have a choice. How it always should have been

@HHSGov In the Pfizer vaccine application report, among the 42,086 people who participated in the vaccine experiment, 1,223 people had fatal consequences and side effects.The vaccine fatality rate was 2.9%, which is 100 times the fatality rate of the new coronavirus!  Biological weapons!

@HHSGov Ron DeSantis said:
Joe Rogan 'Shouldn't Have Apologized' for Slurs of the N-Word or any other defamatory words or statements! 

Ron DeSantis the short-term Governor of Florida has gone on record as condoning slanderous statements all in the name of freedom. 
VOTE HIM OUT IN 2022!
